programme.title: Boundless
programme.desc: After setting sail from Spain, Juan Sebastin Elcano and Ferdinand Magellan embarked on a historic journey around the world.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: The romance between Rachel and Nick faces an unexpected hurdle when Nick takes Rachel to his home in Singapore to attend his best friend's wedding, only for Rachel to discover that she is dating the heir of one of the wealthiest families in Singapore, a family that judges her unfit for their son.

programme.title: Transformers : Dark of the Moon
programme.desc: The Autobots and Decepticons discover a space ship on the moon that contains secrets that can lead to war of the worlds. Events unfold as both sides attempt to capture the space ship.

programme.title: Wonder Park
programme.desc: June, a lively imaginative girl discovers an incredible amusement park, hidden in the woods, and full of talking animals. She soon discovers that the park is the creation of her imagination, and she's the only one who can fix it and bring back the wonder to Wonderland.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: After Sonic the Hedgehog comes to Earth, he hides in the town of Green Hills, and is helped by the town's Sheriff to escape the evil Dr. Robotnik who's hired by the government to capture him.

programme.title: Playing with Fire
programme.desc: When they signed up for their jobs, the last thing a crew of expert firefighters expected is to have to act as babysitters. But when the parents of three siblings that they just rescued from a fire are nowhere to be found, it becomes the firefighters' job to take care of the troublesome trio.

programme.title: Transformers: The Last Knight
programme.desc: Optimus Prime finds his home planet, Cybertron, now a dead planet, and tries to find the person behind its death. He finds a way to bring the planet back to life, but to do so, he needs to find an artifact that is on Earth.

The story revolves around Bablu and Dimpy, who have remained steadfast in their love for each other despite enormous pressure and terrorizing from their communities. They soon realize that the only way to survive is to escape.

programme.title: Freddy
programme.desc: Freddy is a dentist, who lives in isolation with his turtle, Hardy. He tries to get married and registers on many marriage sites, however, he gets rejected as he is not confident enough to speak. He approaches Kainaaz, but he learns that she is married and lives with her abusive husband, Rustom. As Freddy and Kainaaz meet often, Rustom stands in the way. So, Freddy plans to kill Rustom.

programme.title: Ne-wff-ion

programme.title: Dreigiau Cadi
programme.desc: Pan nad oes dwr ar gyfer injans, a all y dreigiau drwsio pethau heb gael eu stemio! When there's no water for engines, can the dragons fix things without getting steamed up!

programme.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd

programme.title: Timpo

Halibalw

programme.title: Abadas
programme.desc: Mae gair heddiw yn rhywbeth sy'n dda am ganfod pethau sy'n anodd eu gweld. Today's word is able to seek out things that can't be seen. What could it be?

programme.title: Guto Gwningen
programme.desc: Wedi i Guto golli hoff degan gwichlyd ei chwaer fach Nel, mae'n rhaid iddo drechu ei holl elynion i'w gael yn l! Guto loses Nel's beloved squeaky rabbit toy; how will he get it back?

programme.title: Sbarc

programme.title: Cymylaubychain

programme.title: Twt
programme.desc: Mae heddiw'n ddiwrnod arbennig iawn, 'Diwrnod y Baneri. Today's a special day; it's Flag Day. Will Twt get his flag ready in time or will he have to miss the parade?

programme.title: Sblij a Sbloj
programme.desc: Yn ystod y rhaglen hon, mae'r ddau ddireidus yn mynd i fowlio 10, gan lwyddo i golli'r lythyren 'i'! The monsters go ten pin bowling - and somehow manage to lose the letter 'i'!

programme.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau

programme.title: Sigldigwt

programme.title: Blociau Lliw
